Package application

Class AppSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.AppSingleton
  • public class AppSingleton
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that handles screens navigation in the application. It works as a stack navigator: screens are pushed on top and popped of. A trick we use here is to make the HomeScreen transparent, so we can have the GameScreen below as moving background.
